action.description: Taken from General File. Placed on Secretary's desk.Taken from Secretary's desk. Placed on General File.Read third time. Amended. (Amend. No. 942.)Reprinting dispensed with.Read third time. Passed, as amended. Title approved, as amended. (Yeas: 13, Nays: 8.) To printer.From printer. To engrossment. Engrossed. First reprint. To Assembly.
